Mediadevice_GetBulkMediaDeviceDetailsWSR.description: Request object for getting media information of any video-supporting media device.

devices.description: Set of device facet UUIDs to get media details for

items.description: RUUID with optional appended facet information

Mediadevice_GetBulkMediaDeviceDetailsWSR.description: Response object containing media information for video-supporting media devices.

mediaDeviceDetails.description: Map of device facet UUIDs to their media device details
